requirements.text: Enhance overall layout with stronger spacing, more structured sections, and minimal elegant design principles to achieve premium corporate consulting appearance
acceptanceCriteria: Increased whitespace between major sections
Consistent padding and margin patterns across all pages
Clean section dividers or subtle separations
Minimal design with reduced visual clutter

constraints: Maintain all existing pages: Home, About Us, Services, Mission & Vision, Contact
Preserve immutable frontend paths: useInternetIdentity hooks, useActor.ts, main.tsx, and src/components/ui
Keep React, Tailwind CSS, and React Query as core frontend stack
Maintain responsive design for mobile and desktop
nonGoals: Adding blog section or additional pages beyond existing structure
Implementing backend functionality or data persistence
Creating authentication or user login features
Adding real-time chat or communication features
